title: Hi there!
welcomeDescription1: JudgeMate is a groundbreaking platform for managing and tracking results in sports competitions.
welcomeDescription2: It's a place where judges, athletes, and fans can actively participate in every stage of the competition.
scorecardsDescription: Judges can easily input and modify scores in real-time.
scheduleManagementDescription: Integrated competition calendar for better organization.
aboutDescription1: JudgeMate is a groundbreaking platform for managing and tracking results in extreme sports competitions.
aboutDescription2: It's a place where judges, athletes, and fans can actively participate in every stage of the competition.
aboutDescription3: The application introduces a new level of interactivity and community.
supportDescription1: Our support team is available 24/7 to help you solve any issues and answer your questions. We are ready to assist with any aspect related to the JudgeMate application.
activationEmailSent: An activation link has been sent to the email address you provided during registration. Activate your account by clicking the link
haveAccount: Already have an account? Sign in
